meta.title: Ozio Group | The Home Services Marketplace
meta.description: Ozio Group - The European home services marketplace. Join a team that makes a difference.

hero.headline: Not Another Call Center.
hero.subheadline: The European marketplace connecting homeowners with skilled tradespeople — locksmiths, plumbers, electricians. Real work that helps real people.

marketplace.headline: What We Do
marketplace.description: Ozio connects homeowners in urgent need with trusted tradespeople. When a family is locked out at -5°C, we find a locksmith in 25 minutes. When a leak threatens a home, we dispatch a qualified plumber.
marketplace.highlight: We don't sell scripts. We solve real problems.

about.headline: About Ozio
about.intro: Since 2016, we've been connecting homeowners in urgent need with trusted tradespeople across Europe. Not a call center — a technology marketplace with a human soul.

culture.headline: Our Culture
culture.intro: No scripts. No robots. Real conversations that help real people.

items.title: Direct
items.description: We tell it like it is. Immediate feedback, no office politics. If something's wrong, we talk about it.

items.title: Demanding
items.description: We aim for excellence. Every call matters, every intervention matters. Because the work matters.

items.title: Fair
items.description: We treat everyone equitably — customers, artisans, colleagues. Trust is earned through actions.

antiRobot.headline: Anti-Robot
antiRobot.description: At Ozio, you're not a number reading a script. Every situation is unique: a family locked out at midnight, a water leak on Sunday. You make real decisions with real impact.
points: Variety of situations — no two days alike

soul.headline: Why It Matters
soul.intro: Behind every call, there's a human story. These aren't metrics — they're moments that matter.

stories.title: 25 Minutes
stories.subtitle: When Every Second Counts
stories.content: A mother with 3 young children — ages 5, 3, and 2 — locked out of their home at -5°C. It's 11 PM on a Tuesday. The youngest is crying. Our team found an available locksmith in 8 minutes. He was on-site in 25 minutes. The children were asleep in their own beds 30 minutes later. The mother called back the next day just to say thank you.
stories.highlight: We don't handle calls. We handle lives.

stories.title: From Suit to Overalls
stories.subtitle: A Career Transformation
stories.content: Marc spent 12 years in banking. Burnt out and searching for meaning, he took a leap. Today, he leads a team of 3 locksmiths and generates €1M in annual revenue through our platform. We helped him launch his business, find his first customers, navigate the administrative maze, and structure his growth. His old colleagues think he's crazy. His kids think he's a hero.
stories.highlight: We don't just connect artisans. We build careers.

stories.title: The Sunday Flood
stories.subtitle: When Disaster Strikes
stories.content: 4 AM on a Sunday. A burst pipe in a family home. Water everywhere, rising fast. Within 12 minutes, we had a plumber en route. He arrived, stopped the flood, and stayed until 7 AM to ensure the family's home was safe. The damage that could have been catastrophic was contained to one room.
stories.highlight: Emergencies don't wait for business hours. Neither do we.

departments.headline: Our Teams
departments.intro: Every department contributes to one mission: connecting those who need help with those who can provide it.

items.name: Tech
items.tagline: Building the future of home services
items.description: The platform that orchestrates everything. APIs, algorithmic matching, mobile apps. Modern stack (React, Node, PostgreSQL), real challenges, and autonomy to ship features that matter.

items.name: Marketing
items.description: Acquisition, SEO, brand, and performance marketing. Data-driven campaigns that connect homeowners in need with artisans who can help. €2M+ annual ad spend to optimize.

items.name: Sales
items.tagline: Growing the network, one artisan at a time
items.description: Building and nurturing our partner artisan network. Field relationships, negotiation, onboarding, and retention. The bridge between Ozio and 2000+ skilled tradespeople.

items.name: Operations
items.description: Coordinating 25,000+ monthly requests. Dispatch optimization, service quality, and process improvement. When a family is locked out at midnight, Operations makes sure help arrives.

items.name: Support
items.description: First responders for customers and artisans. Problem-solving under pressure, de-escalation, and turning stressful moments into positive experiences. No scripts, just empathy.
